name: Retail Banking
description: Provides financial services to individual consumers, including savings accounts, loans, and basic investment products.

name: Commercial Banking
description: Offers specialized services to businesses, including credit facilities, cash management, and trade finance solutions.

name: Investment Banking
description: Facilitates capital raising, mergers and acquisitions, and provides advisory services to corporations and institutions.

name: Asset Management
description: Manages investment portfolios for individuals and institutions, aiming to maximize returns while managing risk.

name: Insurance
description: Provides risk management products to protect individuals and businesses against financial losses.

name: Wealth Management
description: Offers comprehensive financial planning and investment services for high-net-worth individuals.

name: Payment Services
description: Facilitates financial transactions through various channels, including digital platforms and traditional methods.

name: Mortgage Banking
description: Specializes in originating and servicing mortgage loans for residential and commercial properties.

name: Capital Markets
description: Encompasses activities related to trading securities, derivatives, and other financial instruments in organized markets.

name: Fintech
description: Leverages technology to innovate and enhance traditional financial services, often focusing on digital and mobile solutions.
